dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

The following information is presented for the purposes of removing web content that infringes on our copyright per the Digital Millenium Copyright Act. We appreciate your enforcement of copyright law and support of our rights in this matter.

The work infringed is viewable at the following URL:

http://www.snopes.com/politics.bush/house.asp

The location of the material infringing this work is accessible at the following URL:

http://dtbb.blogspot.com/2007/04/glass-houses-claim-e-mail-compares.html

This infringement was noted at 10:11 PM on 5 April 2007.
The complaining party's contact information is as follows:

David Mikkelson
5737 Kanan Rd., #245
Agoura Hills, CA
Contact e-mail: copyright@snopes.com

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Signed,
David Mikkelson
